title.rendered: Select Trading Platform For Elite with 25K Account

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1633887371170{margin-top: 150px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}” el_class=”timeLimit”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1612774504803{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

This will be the platform you will be trading on!

Select your Preferred Trading Platform

[vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”left-im” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7992″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7981″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”right-mc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597477886{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

SELECT TraderEvolution

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7910″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597493874{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

SELECT TradingView

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”left-im” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7990″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7982″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”right-mc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679598240075{margin-top: 25px !important;}”]

SELECT MT4

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”left-im” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7992″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7981″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”right-mc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679597477886{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

SELECT TraderEvolution

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7910″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679914683542{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Temporarily unavailable

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”left-im” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7990″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”7982″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”right-mc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1679598240075{margin-top: 25px !important;}”]

SELECT MT4

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1681066633235{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]Please note:

  • Islamic accounts have higher commissions and somewhat larger spreads, so to enable us to offer Sharia-compliant accounts.
  • The TradingView mobile app is only for “papertrading”, and cannot be used for real trading at the moment. This functionality is coming, but we have no date for roll-out.
    Meanwhile, to check your TradingView account, or trade on your mobile device, you can use the TraderEvolution app.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
